ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is indeed a Glorious Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is indeed the glorious Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Nay; but this is a glorious Qur'an,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: What is revealed to you is certainly a glorious Quran
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact it (what they deny) is the Noble Qur’an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! This is a Glorious Qur'an,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! it is a glorious Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but it is a glorious Koran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but it is a glorious Qur'an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is indeed a glorious Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Aye! it is a Recitation glorious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed it is a glorious Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, this is a Glorious Qur'an,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! This is a Glorious Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, this is a Glorious Koran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, it is a Glorious Quran.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But this is an honored Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:21] Nay, but it is a glorious, a magnificent, Qur’ān,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but it) i.e. the Qur'an which Muhammad (pbuh) recites to you (is a glorious Qur'an) is a noble and honoured Qur'an
